grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 施行【シコウ】execution, enforcing, carrying out, giving alms, giving food to the poor or monks

施行【シコウ】execution, enforcing, carrying out, giving alms, giving food to the poor or monks
布施【フセ】alms-giving, charity, offerings (usu. money) to a priest (for reading sutras, etc.)
